areYouSure: Are you sure you want to finish the quiz?
warning: Once you finish the quiz, you won't be able to make any changes to your answers.
timeLimitReminderDescription: This quiz has a time limit of {{timeLimit}}. Any questions left unanswered when the time runs out will be marked as incorrect. Please manage your time carefully to complete the quiz before the deadline.
timeIsUpDescription: The time limit for this quiz has expired. Any unanswered questions have been marked as incorrect. Your results will be calculated based on your submitted answers.
noUsedAttempts: No attempts have been made yet
